45478.name: Flying Skill: Iron Dragon
45478.toolTip: Use this manual to learn how to summon an iron dragon mount with a Flight and Movement Speed of 290 that restores 1% of your max HP and MP every second. Learning this flying skill also grants you the passive skill Dragon Master, which grants a chance to increase your Crit Power against monsters by a factor of 1.5, when you are not mounted. Dragon Master does not stack with passive skills gained from other mounts, and only grants a bonus if Iron Dragon is the last mount you used.

45479.name: Flying Skill: Crimson Dragon
45479.toolTip: Use this manual to learn how to summon a red dragon mount with a Flight and Movement Speed of 290 that restores 1% of your max HP and MP every second. Learning this flying skill also grants you the passive skill Dragon Master, which grants a chance to increase your Crit Power against monsters by a factor of 1.5, when you are not mounted. Dragon Master does not stack with passive skills gained from other mounts, and only grants a bonus if Crimson Dragon is the last mount you used.

98601.name: Flying Skill: Yellow Bird (Special)
98601.toolTip:
Use this manual to learn how to summon a Yellow Bird with a Flight and Movement Speed of 290 that restores 1% of your max HP and MP every second. Combat Canary grants the passive skill Lucky Feather (increased Crit Power), and the Majestic effect (cancels the effect of Dragonwing, adds a shared cooldown for certain skills). While riding Combat Canary you may use the active skill Arbitrary Gift I (grants a random consumable effect every 24 hours). Using Arbitrary Gift I starts a 1-hour cooldown which may prevent the use of other mount skills.

Non-tradable.

98602.name: Flying Skill: Ultra Yellow Bird (Special)
98602.toolTip:
Use this manual to learn how to summon a Yellow Bird with a Flight and Movement Speed of 290 that restores 2% of your max HP and MP every second. Battle Canary grants the passive skill Lucky Wing (increased Crit Power), and the Majestic effect (cancels the effect of Dragonwing, adds a shared cooldown for certain skills). While riding Battle Canary you may use the active skill Arbitrary Gift II (grants a random consumable effect every hour). Using Arbitrary Gift II starts a 1-hour cooldown which may prevent the use of other mount skills.

Non-tradable.

99102.name: Flying Skill: Ghost Dragon
99102.toolTip: Use this manual to learn how to summon a ghost dragon mount with a Flight and Movement Speed of 290 that restores 1% of your max HP and MP every second. Learning this flying skill also grants you the passive skill Dragon Master, which grants a chance to increase your Crit Power against monsters by a factor of 1.5, when you are not mounted. Dragon Master does not stack with passive skills gained from other mounts, and only grants a bonus if Ghost Dragon is the last mount you used.

99104.name: Flying Skill: Royal Iron Dragon
99104.toolTip: Use this manual to learn how to summon a royal iron dragon mount with a Flight and Movement Speed of 290 that restores 2% of your max HP and MP every second, and creates an aura which increases ground Movement Speed of nearby party members' mounts by 10. Learning this flying skill also grants you the passive skill Draconis Rex, which grants a chance to double your Crit Power against monsters, when you are not mounted. Draconis Rex does not stack with passive skills gained from other mounts, and only grants a bonus if Royal Iron Dragon is the last mount you used.

99531.name: Flying Skill: Azure Phoenix
99531.toolTip:
Use this manual to learn how to summon a phoenix mount with a Flight and Movement Speed of 290 that restores 1% of your max HP and MP every second. Learning this flying skill grants you the passive skills Blazing Aura I (increased Crit Power) and Phoenix Aura I (free resurrection every 24 hours), and the Majestic effect (cancels the effect of Dragonwing, adds a shared cooldown for certain skills). Using Phoenix Aura I activates a 24-hour cooldown which may prevent you from using other mount skills.

Non-tradable.

202116.name: Flying Skill: Dark Dragon [Red] (Special)
202116.toolTip:
Use this manual to learn how to summon Dark Dragon [Red] with a Flight and Movement Speed of 290 that restores 1% of your max HP and MP every second. Learning this flying skill also grants you the passive skill Darkened Rex, which provides a chance to increase your Crit Power by a factor of 1.5 and deal additional damage against monsters when you are not mounted. Using Darkened Rex starts a 24-hour cooldown which may prevent the use of other mount skills.

Non-tradable.

232018.name: 스킬교본: 메카닉 A
232018.toolTip:
[[서비스 이관 특별 선물]]

비행 가능 지역에서 날 수 있는 해방된 페가수스를 소환합니다.
페가수스의 비행 속도는 270이며, 지상에서의 이동속도는 280입니다.
